Class InfoView

java.lang.Object

com.hfych2.brickdestroy.view.InfoView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class InfoView
extends javax.swing.JTextPane
This class is a newly created class that is not from the original code.
This class represents the view for when the "INFO" button of the HomeMenu is clicked.
See Also:
Document, SimpleAttributeSet, MatteBorder, Document.insertString(int, String, AttributeSet), Serialized Form
